competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Powerful data visualization tool founded in 2003, already established in the market when Domo was founded

competitors.name: QlikView
competitors.notes: Business intelligence and data visualization platform, well-established by 2010

competitors.name: MicroStrategy
competitors.notes: High performance, scalable BI platform delivering interactive dashboards and analytics, established player

competitors.name: IBM Cognos
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI and performance management software suite, major incumbent in 2010

competitors.name: SAP BusinessObjects
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI platform, major competitor in the traditional BI space

competitors.name: Oracle BI
competitors.notes: Oracle's business intelligence platform, established enterprise solution

context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. Founded to democratize BI. Cloud-native analytics platform.
